Description: Inlay in the form of a falcon with raised wings. Consists of a network of cells in metal on a metal back-plate, originally filled with coloured glass but now almost all empty. Some cells retain elements of blue or red glass, or the decayed remnants of glass paste. Object in fragmentary state with one foot and parts of the wings and neck missing. Head and surviving foot separate, as is the tail. Back is decorated with fine incised detail of feathers. Foot grips a 'shen'-ring.
